Events that occurred on 7 October.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1945 - Author Hal Colebatch is born.
1983 - Amateur actress Hannah Wood is born.
1984 - Oxonmoot 1984 at Oxford Town Hall.
2007 - Cair Andros, a feast of the Ellinikós Sýllogos Philon Tólkin.
2008 - The 1992 radio series of Tales from the Perilous Realm is re-released in the US.
2019 - Music in Tolkien's Work and Beyond is published.
2022 - The episode The Eye of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
With Frodo severely wounded, Strider and the four hobbits travel slowly towards Rivendell.
Gandalf hurries towards Rivendell after the Black Riders attacked him on Weathertop.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
